page.title: 15AMBLE INDUSTRIAL ESTATE
page.content: {Amble Industrial Estate}is located on the{southern outskirts of the town}on land which previously had been{open {fields.}The Estate was established in {1969}to attract{new industries}to the town and{to create new jobs}in an area where{one in three}people are at present{unemployed.}The Industrial Site is situated between Alnwick and Morpeth. It gives relatively easy {access}from the north to{Scotland}and from the south to{Newcastle.}Until {1985}Amble was designated a{Special {Development Area}by the government, but in recent months the town has{lost {this status.}Coquet High School pupils made up a{questionnaire}to find out {why each factory was located in Amble. Employers chose the site basically because they{could not get another elsewhere and it was in a good place for{trading in Northumberland.
